pages.text: $(thing)Health:$() 20     $(br) $(thing)Attack Damage:$() 3     $(br) $(thing)Behavior:$() Aggressive     $(br) $(thing)Spawn:$() $(l)Overworld$() $(br) $(thing)Description:$() $(br)Wanders around the caves to hunt the humans. Because of it's dark colors it is hard to see him in the caves. It can only be hurt by a special enchantment called $(item)Demon Slayer$().
